amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to be used to plan or undertake sales or any other transfers of natural or low enriched uranium from the Department of Energy that combined exceed 1,917 metric tons of uranium as uranium hexafluoride equivalent in fiscal year 2013.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to plan or undertake sales or any other transfers of natural or low enriched uranium from the Department of Energy that combined exceed 1,917 metric tons of uranium as uranium hexafluoride equivalent in fiscal year 2013.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lummis amendment (A056) Failed by recorded vote: 114 - 302 (Roll no. 339).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lummis amendment (A056) Failed by recorded vote: 114 - 302 (Roll no. 339).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A056) offered by Mrs. Lummis.
